document.full_text: the ottawa senators snapped new york's five-game win streak with a 2-1 shootout victory over the rangers in a defensive clash at madison square garden on thursday.
document.title: senators snap rangers streak with shootout victory
lines_and_colors: the ottawa senators snapped new york's five-game win streak with a 2-1 shootout victory over the rangers in a defensive clash at madison square garden on thursday.
